statements: SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule WHERE schedule_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_name, schedule_date FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-10-31';
SELECT classroom_id, MAX(schedule_date) FROM course_schedule GROUP BY classroom_id;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, schedule_date FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE instructor_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT course_name, schedule_date FROM course_schedule WHERE classroom_id = 101 ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, classroom_id FROM course_schedule WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_classes, instructor_name FROM course_schedule GROUP BY instructor_name HAVING total_classes > 5 ORDER BY total_classes DESC;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule
SELECT course_id, course_name, days, start_time, end_time FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY course_name ASC
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_name FROM CourseSchedule WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT classroom_id, classroom_name, building_name, capacity FROM ClassroomAssignment WHERE capacity > 50
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE days LIKE '%Mon%'
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, days, start_time, end_time FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT DISTINCT building_name, classroom_name, capacity FROM ClassroomAssignment WHERE equipment LIKE '%projector%';
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, days FROM CourseSchedule WHERE days LIKE '%Monday%' AND end_time > '15:00:00';
SELECT classroom_name, building_name, capacity FROM ClassroomAssignment WHERE status = true ORDER BY building_name DESC, classroom_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, professor_name FROM Course;
SELECT course_id, course_name, professor_name FROM Course WHERE professor_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM Classroom ORDER BY building_name ASC, capacity DESC;

SELECT schedule_id, course_name, classroom_name, start_time, end_time FROM Schedule JOIN Course ON Schedule.course_id = Course.course_id JOIN Classroom ON Schedule.classroom_id = Classroom.classroom_id;
SELECT * FROM Course WHERE professor_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT course_id, course_name, professor_name FROM Course ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Schedule WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 10:00:00' AND '2022-01-01 14:00:00';

SELECT Course.course_name, Classroom.classroom_name, Schedule.start_time FROM (Course JOIN Schedule ON Course.course_id = Schedule.course_id) JOIN Classroom ON Schedule.classroom_id = Classroom.classroom_id;
SELECT Course.course_name, COUNT(Schedule.schedule_id) AS schedule_count FROM Course LEFT JOIN Schedule ON Course.course_id = Schedule.course_id GROUP BY Course.course_name HAVING schedule_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Course WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT classroom_location, capacity FROM Classroom ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT assignment_name FROM Assignment WHERE assignment_id = 3;
SELECT schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM Schedule WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Course ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Schedule WHERE start_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT Classroom.classroom_location, COUNT(Schedule.schedule_id) AS num_classes FROM Classroom JOIN Schedule ON Classroom.classroom_id = Schedule.classroom_id GROUP BY Classroom.classroom_location;

SELECT Course.course_name, Assignment.assignment_name FROM Course INNER JOIN Schedule ON Course.course_id = Schedule.course_id INNER JOIN Assignment ON Schedule.schedule_id = Assignment.schedule_id WHERE Schedule.schedule_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY Course.course_name ASC, Assignment.assignment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM Courses;
SELECT room_number, room_id FROM Classrooms;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, course_id FROM Courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Schedule WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE course_name = 'Mathematics';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM Courses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, room_number FROM Courses JOIN Classrooms ON Courses.course_id = Classrooms.room_id WHERE course_name LIKE '%Science%' ORDER BY room_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM Schedule WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' AND end_time < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY schedule_id;
SELECT Courses.course_name, Instructors.instructor_name FROM Courses JOIN Instructors ON Courses.instructor_name = Instructors.instructor_name WHERE Courses.course_id = 1;
